post.body: way to go Beks! we want to meet Eden tonight!!! praying for you! XOXO
i can't wait to marry you.
i have a very task-oriented fiance! he's amazing!!!
he's still coming after you?!?!? GET A CLUE!!!!!!!
i agree! i was in tears the whole time!!!
OUCH!
Speak, Lord, in the stillness, while I wait on Thee. Hushed my heart to listen in expectancy.
"Some call Atlanta the jewel of the south, you know, it's in Georgia!!"
is looking at bridesmaids dresses online. :)
is cleaning her room with her mom. :)
is creating the wording for her wedding invitations and programs.
is one month to 30! the countdown begins.
loved the quality family time she got today.
is trying to find cute save-the-date e-cards!
loves listening to the noises her 8 month old nephew is making in his bed first thing in the morning. This is the best Christmas ever!
is getting married in 130 days!!!!!!!!!
can't wait to see her sis and nephew tonight!!!!!!!!!!!
is packing for her trip to Charlotte tomorrow.
's dream of a true love's kiss came true!!!!!!!
